home.parse.title: Number Input Parsing
home.parse.desc: Parse number input based on current locale settings (e.g., German uses comma as decimal, dot as thousands)
home.parse.hint: Tip: Change number locale in settings to see different parsing behavior

home.tip.title: Option/Alt+Click Navigation
home.tip.desc: In development mode, hold Option (Mac) or Alt (Windows/Linux) and click any translated text to jump to the corresponding line in the JSON source file.
